name: Untangled
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 34 by Ava Skoog, Marte Kvamme Strømmen & Morten Formo (zbegra on itch). This jam had two themes: growing and two-button controls. We decided to incorporate the first into the main game and the latter into a minigame. Keyboard and mouse!

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=6155

Rapunzel has a brush with fate as she accidentally falls from her tower, cutting her hair off in the process—whip your hair back and forth to help her return to her tower in time for coffee with her hairy godmother!

We never quite got the hair to stick as nicely to her head as we would've wanted (and it sure doesn't look as awesome as Marte's amazing promo/title art below), but it was an interesting mechanic to mess with!
